name: Kiril Morozov
story: Kiril Morozov was born and raised in Moscow, Russia. He joined the military at the age of 18, where he became a highly skilled sniper. After serving in the military for 10 years, he decided to take a job as a security contractor for a private company. He is now stationed in Altis, where he provides security for various high-profile clients. Kiril is married and has two children, whom he misses dearly while being away on assignment.
